description: Sedge (Carex siderosticha 'Lemon Zest') is an amazing plant for its stunning bright yellow color and versatility. It adds broadcast but subtle color to any garden with its spiky, broadly arching foliage. It is low-maintenance, easy to grow, and it can be used in many configurations - whether planted in large sweeps, as an edging plant, or in containers. Its tough and drought-resistant nature mean you don't have to worry about overwatering it or having to constantly move it indoors in the winter. With its vibrant and attractive foliage, Sedge 'Lemon Zest' is a great addition to any garden.
